sections.heading: precursor; seller; immunity.A seller utilizing in good faith sections 28-458 to 28-462 shall be immune from any civil cause of action based upon an act or omission in carrying out such sections

sections.text:
28-461.Methamphetamine precursor; seller; immunity.

A seller utilizing in good faith sections 28-458 to 28-462 shall be immune from any civil cause of action based upon an act or omission in carrying out such sections.

SourceLaws 2011, LB20, ยง 6.
